Josephina's Companion Izael:
Ah, an ill-omened place, indeed. Many ages ago, a group of heroes quarreled with their god, and they were cursed to wander forever in the form of vicious monsters who shun the light.
Fortuna was the heroes' fortress, but it's become a place of darkness. Nobody who enters it can leave.
[npc_%objectId%_Chat 2|"I don't fear Fortuna."]
